message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item to you today for $11,500. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested but $11,500 is a bit steep for me. Would you consider $10,500?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I value your offer, $11,000 is the lowest I'm willing to go.
I understand, Alice.  $10,750 is my final offer, if you're not able to accept I'll have to consider my other options.
